channel.title: Vexpert on davidstamen.com
channel.description: Recent content in Vexpert on davidstamen.com

item.title: vExpert 2018
item.description: I am honored to have been selected as a VMware vExpert once again for 2018!

item.title: vExpert 2017
item.description: I am honored to have been selected as a VMware vExpert once again for 2017! This is my fifth year as a vExpert (2013,2014,2015,2016 and 2017). It has been great to see the community grow and the amount of vExperts increase. I did a quick count, and in 2016 we are up to 1464 vExperts!

item.title: vExpert 2016
item.description: I am honored to have been selected as a VMware vExpert once again for 2016! This is my fourth year as a vExpert (2013,2014,2015 and 2016). It has been great to see the community grow and the amount of vExperts increase. I did a quick count, and in 2016 we are up to 1360 vExperts! Can’t wait to see what this year brings.
